channel.title: Invite Code Error
channel.description:
What happened: Copied and pasted an invite code and it tried to connect and it just kept saying verifying for ages
What was SUPPOSED to happen: It reads the invite code and joins the game
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Get invite code 2. Submit it into invite code box 3. Join game
This seems like a personal problem so please contact me with support. Forum message me please thanks

item.title: Invite Code Error
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
If the host was in an older version that could also be the problem if it only happened once there.

Read full topic

item.title: Invite Code Error
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
It worked for public lobbies did not try private ones yet, but will update you on when I test it out. I usually never use invite codes, but during the TOL IV tournament I was sent an invite code and it did not work.

Read full topic

item.title: Invite Code Error
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Did it happen once, or can you still not join with codes? Trying verifying your files just in case thereâ€™s something missing. Also, checks that you are on the latest version, there was an update couple hours ago. If you keep having issues, try to put a code and send us the logs before restarting the game.

Let us know if it was fixed!

Read full topic

item.description:
What happened:
Copied and pasted an invite code and it tried to connect and it just kept saying verifying for ages

What was SUPPOSED to happen:
